mean_cn: v. 剥皮，削皮，去壳；  n. 果皮，外皮
mean_en: to take the outer layer off fruit, vegetables, etc.; to remove a layer, covering, etc. from the surface of something; to come off the surface of something; (of a covering) to come off in strips or small pieces; (of a surface) to lose strips or small pieces of its covering
sentence_trans: 这个男人正在削土豆皮。
